metadata.title: CVE-2023-52472 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: rsa - add a check for allocation failureStatic checkers insist that the mpi_alloc() allocation can fail so adda check to prevent a NULL dereference.  Small allocations like thiscan't actually fail in current kernels, but adding a check is verysimple and makes the static checkers happy.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
